pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pedigree, Genetic Merit, Phenotype, and Genotype Simulation // Simulate pedigree, genetic merits and phenotypes with random/non-random matings followed by random/non-random selection with different intensities and patterns in males and females. Genotypes can be simulated for a given pedigree, or an appended pedigree to an existing pedigree with genotypes. Mrode, R. A. (2005) ISBN:9780851989969, 0851989969; Nilforooshan, M.A. (2022) doi:10.37496/rbz5120210131.
